verbs.description: [ARG1: iran] [V: becoming] [ARG2: superpower tehran iran] -president mahmoud ahmadinejad of iran under increasing criticism at home said yesterday that his nation was becoming a superpower and that the u n sanctions would not deter it ruhollah khomeini ali khamenei mahmoud ahmadinejad iran
